Class FireBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.Body
      • city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
        • game.FireBall

  • public class FireBall
extends city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
    Class represents FireBall dynamic body which
    the player can use to inflict damage on the ufo.
    Since:
    version 1.0
